content.text: Communication protocols shall be encrypted to prevent unauthorized access.
 The mower shall not restart automatically after emergency stop activation.
 The mower shall not operate during severe weather conditions.
 All safety components shall comply with both CE safety standards and REACH chemical regulations.
The emergency stop system shall comply with ISO 13850:2015 for emergency stop principles.
 The emergency stop system shall comply with ISO 13850:2015 for emergency stop principles.
The system shall meet or exceed IP65 rating for water and dust resistance.
 The system shall meet or exceed IP65 rating for water and dust resistance.
Noise level shall not exceed 65 dB measured at 3 feet.
 The mower shall be capable of navigating slopes up to 25° incline.
The mower shall not operate on slopes exceeding 25° incline.
 The cutting system shall comply with ISO 5395-2:2013 for garden equipment safety standards.
 The blade sharpness and durability shall meet ANSI/OPEI B71.1-2017 safety specifications.
The mower shall incorporate ground-penetrating radar to detect terrain irregularities.
The mower shall incorporate machine learning algorithms for optimizing cutting patterns.
 The mower shall not override safety protocols even when in manual control mode.
AI systems shall be developed in accordance with ISO/IEC TR 24028:2020 for AI trustworthiness.
The mower shall support Wi-Fi (2.4/5GHz) for primary network connection.
The mower shall support Bluetooth for close-range configuration.
The mower shall include physical and remote emergency stop capabilities.
 The system shall automatically detect and avoid people, animals, and obstacles.
 The mower shall be constructed with impact-resistant polymer body with aluminum reinforcement.
The mower shall not cut grass when wet conditions exceed safety parameters.
The mower shall support wireless boundary definition with physical wire option as backup.
 The mower shall support wireless boundary definition with physical wire option as backup.
 The mower shall incorporate a 360° LiDAR system with minimum 15m detection range.
All electronic components shall be free of restricted substances as defined by REACH regulations.
 The navigation algorithms shall comply with ISO/PAS 21448 (SOTIF) for autonomous system safety.
Radio frequency components shall comply with ETSI EN 300 328 for data transmission equipment.
The mower shall incorporate GPS tracking, alarm system, and authentication requirements.
 The mower shall automatically stop blades when lifted or tilted.
 The overall safety design shall comply with ISO 12100:2010 for general principles of machinery safety.
The mower dimensions shall not exceed 22" × 20" × 10" (L×W×H).
 All polymers and plastics used in construction shall comply with REACH regulations for SVHCs (Substances of Very High Concern).
 Cutting height shall be adjustable from 1 to 4 inches via automated system or app control.
The blade sharpness and durability shall meet ANSI/OPEI B71.1-2017 safety specifications.
 The navigation system shall utilize GPS + RTK for positioning accuracy of 2cm or better.
 The system shall include ultrasonic proximity sensors for close-range obstacle detection.
 The mower shall utilize computer vision with object recognition capabilities.
The system shall employ SLAM technology for accurate yard mapping.
 The system shall include intelligent scheduling with weather-adaptive operation.
 The mower shall provide smartphone app with manual override capabilities.
The control systems shall comply with IEC 61508 for functional safety of electrical/electronic/programmable systems.
The system shall include cellular (4G LTE) backup connection capability.
 All wireless communications shall comply with IEEE 802.11 standards for WiFi.
 The mower shall include physical and remote emergency stop capabilities.
Safety systems shall meet IEC 62061 safety standards for machinery control systems.
 Noise level shall not exceed 65 dB measured at 3 feet.
 The mower shall not have exposed sharp edges that could cause injury.
 Ground speed shall be adjustable between 0-3 mph, with automatic adjustment based on grass density.
Electric motors shall conform to IEC 60034 series standards for rotating electrical machines.
The mower shall utilize computer vision with object recognition capabilities.
 The mower shall incorporate ground-penetrating radar to detect terrain irregularities.
The mower shall not continue operation when primary sensing systems fail.
 The mower shall not continue operation when primary sensing systems fail.
 The sensing systems shall comply with IEC 61496 for safety-related electro-sensitive protective equipment.
 The system shall employ SLAM technology for accurate yard mapping.
 The control systems shall comply with IEC 61508 for functional safety of electrical/electronic/programmable systems.
System architecture shall follow ISO/IEC/IEEE 42010:2011 for systems architecture description.
 The system shall facilitate OTA firmware and software updates.
Bluetooth implementation shall comply with Bluetooth SIG standards version 5.0 or higher.
 Bluetooth implementation shall comply with Bluetooth SIG standards version 5.0 or higher.
The system shall automatically detect and avoid people, animals, and obstacles.
 The system shall feature enhanced detection for children and pets with enlarged safety perimeter.
The mower shall not restart automatically after emergency stop activation.
The mower shall not operate during severe weather conditions.
All safety components shall comply with both CE safety standards and REACH chemical regulations.
 Object detection systems shall meet IEC 62998 for safety-related sensors used for protection of persons.
 The mower dimensions shall not exceed 22" × 20" × 10" (L×W×H).
The mower weight shall not exceed 35 lbs including battery.
 The mower shall not cut grass when wet conditions exceed safety parameters.
The mower shall not operate beyond defined boundary limits under any circumstances.
 The mower shall not operate beyond defined boundary limits under any circumstances.
 AI systems shall be developed in accordance with ISO/IEC TR 24028:2020 for AI trustworthiness.
 The system shall include cellular (4G LTE) backup connection capability.
The mower shall not connect to unsecured networks without user authorization.
 Communication protocols shall be encrypted to prevent unauthorized access.
Cellular communications shall comply with 3GPP standards for LTE connectivity.
 Cellular communications shall comply with 3GPP standards for LTE connectivity.
Network security shall comply with ISO/IEC 27033 for IT network security.
